_comment: Intelligent Router Configuration - Define your available LLM models here. Customize tiers, costs, and providers to match your setup. The router.py script uses this file to classify tasks and estimate costs.

_instructions.tier: One of: SIMPLE, MEDIUM, COMPLEX, CRITICAL
_instructions.provider: Provider name (anthropic, openai, google, nvidia, local, etc.)
_instructions.input_cost_per_m: Cost per million input tokens in USD
_instructions.output_cost_per_m: Cost per million output tokens in USD
_instructions.capabilities: Array of capabilities: [text, code, reasoning, vision, function-calling]
_instructions.notes: Optional notes about the model's strengths or limitations

models.notes: Best for monitoring, status checks, and simple summarization
Good balance of cost and capability for general coding tasks
High-quality model for complex multi-file development and debugging
Best available model for security audits and production-critical work
